parameters: \m[clear](The woman is daydreaming, singing softly under her breath.)
\m[vwoman]\n<\v[46]>Oh, hi!\!\ You're one of the saviors, aren't you!\!\ I recognize you!
\n<\v[46]>And you traveled with a few people, right!\!\ You traveled with, um...
\m[vwoman]\n<\v[46]>Mirabelle!!!\!\ I know her, she's from here!!!
\n<\v[46]>What a wonderful young woman.\!\ I never talked to her much, though!
\n<\v[46]>Hm, I wonder though...\!\ Is she the younger or older sister of your group?\!\ She'd fit both, wouldn't she?
\n<\v[46]>What a nice young man.\!\ And so full of energy, too!
\n<\v[46]>I'm an only child, but I feel like having an older brother like him would be fun.
\n<\v[46]>She's from Ka Bue, yes?\!\ My sister visited Ka Bue, once.
\n<\v[46]>Did you know they call most people by their last names?\!\ Such a different culture!
\n<\v[46]>And this Odile, hm, I can tell...
\n<\v[46]>She's like the mom of the group, isn't she?
\n<\v[46]>DEFINITELY the younger sibling of your group, there's no doubt about it.
\m[clear](The woman is daydreaming, singing softly under her breath.)
make sure it works beyond loop 0
\m[clear](Mirabelle is here, sitting on a bench and looking at papers.)
\m[vm]Oh!\!\ That's right, you were asleep when everyone left...
Odile is in the shop, right next door!\!\ It's the house with all the barrels!
Isabeau is walking in the forest nearby...\!\ He said he wanted to take in the sights, or something?
Since he's from a big city, I think seeing this many trees is still quite new for him!
\m[clear](So he's still going puppy mode, you get it.)
\m[vm]As for Bonnie, they found a big field of veggies a little ways from the village and ran towards it, screaming "FRESH VEGGIES!!!"!
I think we'll eat well tonight!
\m[clear](So you'll only be able to talk to Odile right now, huh...)
\m[vm]How I'm feeling...?\!\ Oh, being in Dormont, you mean?
It's nostalgic...\!\ This is where I lived before, after all.\!\ I mean, when I wasn't studying or working at the House.
Dormont itself hasn't changed much, but the House...
...\!We can see it from the village, you know.\!\ How distorted it has become.
I was the only one who managed to escape the House when the King attacked...\!\ So many people must be hurt...
\m[vm]...Yes.\!\ You're right.\!\ I should stay positive...\!\ Sorry.
\n<\v[46]>You're not from Vaugarde, are you?\!\ That's the rumor, at least.
\n<\v[46]>I'm from Poteria myself.\!\ I came to Vaugarde to further my studies, a few months ago.
\m[vman]\n<\v[46]>It's nice, right?\!\ Lots of scholars, good food, welcoming people.
\n<\v[46]>Especially their Houses of Change.\!\ They let everyone in, and aren't shy about sharing their knowledge, even if you don't follow their belief.
\n<\v[46]>It's strange, right?\!\ I've traveled a lot, but I've never been to a country with such welcoming people.\!\ I could move here, to be honest.
\n<\v[46]>...\!\m[wait]Well, it's a little awkward right now, with the King.\!\ I might actually be forced to move here.\!\ Permanently.
\n<\v[46]>...\!I should pick a good spot to be frozen in...
\n<\v[46]>Ah, not that I think you won't win tomorrow, of course.\!\ I have faith you'll win, of course.
(People always notice you're not from here, but they're more likely to ask if you'd like to stay at their home for a bit than anything else.)
\m[vman]\n<\v[46]>Good luck, from one traveler to another.
(That's too bad...\!\ You're a little hungry!)
\m[clear](Oh, right, Mirabelle woke you up AND talked to you here too...)
(You've seen this once before, so you should maybe...\!\ Act the same as you did the first time???\!\ Figure something out, quick.)
\m[vm]...Still half asleep, huh?\!\ How was your nap?
\m[clear](Okay take two.\!\ Say something.\!\ Make normal words come out of your mouth.)
"（スマートでいつも通りの言葉だ、ゴー！）"
"Yes. Correct. I was taking nap time."
"Yes. Correct. I was taking nap time."
\m[vm]Oh, wait!\!\ I had something I wanted to ask you!!!
Um, I have an idea for tonight...\!\ This will be the night before we go fight the King, so I felt like we could make it special somehow...
So, I was thinking, how about a sleepover?
Let's all eat good food together!\!\ Sleep in the same room!\!\ Maybe tell stories!!!
It would be nice, wouldn't it?
\m[clear](Suddenly, you remember where this conversation is heading.)\!\m[wait]\^
(She talked to you about this sleepover...\!\ And you only said "Okay...?" like a terrible rude awful person, and...)
\shake(THIS IS THE MOMENT IN THE CONVERSATION WHERE YOU MADE MIRABELLE UPSET...!!!)
(Can you change it?\!\ Can you change fate?!?\!\ Only one way to find out...)
"That sounds like an AMAZING\n   idea, Mira!"
"That sounds like an AMAZING\n   idea, Mira!"
Yay, wonderful!!!\!\ I can't wait for all of us to spend time together tonight!!!
(This was a small change, but if your fate isn't set in stone...\!\ Then...)
\m[vm]...So I will see you later, alright?\!\ Don't forget to look around the town for a bit!
\m[clear](Okay, that was...\!\ slightly different from what you remembered, but still...)
(So it seems you really are...\!\ repeating the same day.\!\ With small differences.)
(And Mirabelle...\!\ doesn't seem to be aware of it.)
(Are you the only one repeating today?)
\m[wait]\m[wait][Come to the Favor Tree at the West of the village, stardust.]\m[rb]
\m[clear](There's more to explore this way, but...)
(You'd like to go see the Favor Tree West of the village first.)
(You shouldn't bother him...\!\ Better talk to Odile and Bonnie first.)
(You also need to check the Change God's statue...\!\ Just so you can tell Mirabelle you did it.)
\m[clear](You need to see if Bonnie is okay.)
\m[clear](There's more to explore this way, but...)
(You'd like to go see the Favor Tree West of the village first.)
\n<\v[46]>You look like someone who would like fishing.
\n<\v[46]>Would you like to fish for a little bit?
(You don't really know how to do this.)
(You take the fishing pole they're offering you,\!\ choose a lure the same shade as the water,\!\ check the fishing pole,\!\ throw it in the water,\!\ and sit down and wait.)
\m[vo]There's no need to go here right now, is there?
\n<\v[46]>Scrawny one, did you know you can press \v[376] to run?\!\ You should give it a try sometime!
\n<\v[46]>Oh!\!\ And did you know you can turn ON "Always Run" in your Options menu?\!\ So you can run all the time?

\n<\v[46]>Did you know?\!\ Did you know about this?\!\ Did you know pressing \v[376] makes you run?\!\ Did you know you can run all the time by going into the Options menu?\!\ Do you run?\!\ DO YOU LIKE RUNNING?
"More of a lazy, take it easy type."
"More of a lazy, take it easy type."
\n<\v[46]>I, I mean, understandable!\!\ You look like you've never ran a day in your life!
\n<\v[46]>So you need to BUILD UP THOSE MUSCLES!\!\ GET FAST!\!\ GET SWOLE!\!\ AND PRESS \v[376] TO RUN!!!!!
(You may look scrawny, but you're definitely the fastest one out of your group!\!\ Hmf!)
\m[clear](They mutter "run run run run run run run" repeatedly under their breath.)
\m[clear](Statues, big and small, all with different faces.)
(Some of them have sad eyes, others a bright smile.)
(A few are animated by Craft, and one jumps around and bumps gently into your foot.)
(The Change God, deity worshipped by all of the country of Vaugarde, stands before you.)
